com.gej.core

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.core.Global

  • public final class Global
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static fields which can be called by any sprite, or the game class itself.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACTUAL_STEPS_FOR_SECOND
      The actual speed of the game in steps per second
      static boolean ENABLE_COLLISION_DETECTION_FOR_ALL_OBJECTS
      If disabled, collision detection is only done for objects which are visible in the view.

      The FPS of the game

      The switch for full screen mode

      Variable containing the current GEJ version

      The window height
      static boolean HIDE_CURSOR
      The property to show or hide cursor
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> PROPERTIES
      A map containing various properties
      static int STEPS_FOR_SECOND
      The speed of the game in steps for second.
      static boolean STRETCH_TO_SCREEN
      Fits the drawn game to the window so that nothing in the view is escaped out.

      The window title
      static int UPDATE_RATE
      The percentage of updates done by the engine.
      static boolean USE_PIXELPERFECT_COLLISION
      The switch for pixel perfect collision detection
      static boolean WEB_MODE
      Indicates that the game has been running in the web mode

      The window width

    • Field Detail

      • TITLE

        public static java.lang.String TITLE
        The window title

      • WIDTH

        public static int WIDTH
        The window width

      • HEIGHT

        public static int HEIGHT
        The window height

      • USE_PIXELPERFECT_COLLISION

        public static boolean USE_PIXELPERFECT_COLLISION
        The switch for pixel perfect collision detection

      • ENABLE_COLLISION_DETECTION_FOR_ALL_OBJECTS

        public static boolean ENABLE_COLLISION_DETECTION_FOR_ALL_OBJECTS
        If disabled, collision detection is only done for objects which are visible in the view. This is disabled by default. You may want to enable this feature for some games.

      • HIDE_CURSOR

        public static boolean HIDE_CURSOR
        The property to show or hide cursor

      • FULLSCREEN

        public static boolean FULLSCREEN
        The switch for full screen mode

      • STEPS_FOR_SECOND

        public static int STEPS_FOR_SECOND
        The speed of the game in steps for second. This is the speed with which the game will be updated. You can experiment with change in this value to see which speed aptly suites your game.

      • FRAMES_PER_SECOND

        public static int FRAMES_PER_SECOND
        The FPS of the game

      • ACTUAL_STEPS_FOR_SECOND

        public static int ACTUAL_STEPS_FOR_SECOND
        The actual speed of the game in steps per second

      • UPDATE_RATE

        public static int UPDATE_RATE
        The percentage of updates done by the engine. Best if the percentage is greater than 70.

      • STRETCH_TO_SCREEN

        public static boolean STRETCH_TO_SCREEN
        Fits the drawn game to the window so that nothing in the view is escaped out. This makes the display of text using the Java2D fonts to an uneasy way

      • WEB_MODE

        public static boolean WEB_MODE
        Indicates that the game has been running in the web mode

      • PROPERTIES

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> PROPERTIES
        A map containing various properties

      • GEJ_VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String GEJ_VERSION
        Variable containing the current GEJ version
